name: LazyTS
tagline: PowerShell Script (GUI) to manage Terminal Sessions
body:
### LazyTS Script
LazyTS is a PowerShell script to manage Sessions and Processes on local or remote machines. It allows you to Query/Disconnect/Stop session(s), Query/Stop process(es) and Send Interactive message to one or more sessions.

This tool is using the module PSTerminalService which relies on the Cassia .NET Library.I used Sapien PowerShell Studio 2014 to which make life easier if you want to start building WinForms tools and add PowerShell code.

![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a4c4232cdacc906377388a692f5e90338da0c201/687474703a2f2f322e62702e626c6f6773706f742e636f6d2f2d6e785f555a6f54513361382f56433463756d495a4d33492f41414141414141426f654d2f7846345a394d2d644e67632f73313630302f4c617a7954532e706e67)

[http://www.lazywinadmin.com/p/lazyts.html](http://www.lazywinadmin.com/p/lazyts.html)

### Author

Francois-Xavier Cat [@LazyWinAdm](https://twitter.com/LazyWinAdm)
